::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus was doing the same, tracking the signal, when he met up with his family.

Rodimus: There you two are. I just wanted to check up on you before we deal with that Predacon. You both help the city defense. Team three essentially.

He looks at Elita.

Rodimus: I want you to stay with your mother and help with the defenses within the city. You'll best help that way. If by some chance the Pred makes it into the city, I want you to take cover. No heroics on this one. Understand, hunny?

Rodimus looks back to his wife.

Rodimus: I got to go meet up with my team at the exit tunnel and take position on the entrence ramp. Be careful. I love you both.

Rodimus hugs his daughter and kisses his wife.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Nighlight:
 
 "Elita es with me"said Nighlight"Where are you?"
 
 Nightlight tracked the signal and she and Elita walked trough the base
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus exited the room, chacking is weapon systems. Everything 
 seemed in order.
 > 
 > Rodimus opened a comm channel.
 > 
 > Rodimus: Nightlight, Elita, where are you? I'd like to see you two 
 before we take positions. We have 10 cycles.
 > 
 > Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> 
 wrote:                                  "All right, if there are no 
 no more questions, let's move out.  Team
 >  three, go to your positions, teams one and two, meet me down at the
 >  exit
 >  tunnel entrance in 10 cycles." he paused a minute then walked out 
 the
 >  door toward the armory.
 >  
 >  Salveo began preparing the security systems.  "If  you need help 
 with
 >  your radio, I can help.  Otherwise, go and gear up."
 >  
 >  Guardia and Ravenchief left the room, following Perseus.
 >

 better
 >  > get moving.
 >  >
 >  > ***
 >  >
 >  > Still reflecting, Dinobot was considering what to do. Of course, 
 he
 >  > could remain true to his word... And yet, so much was at stake. 
 He
 >  > remembered Optimus Primal. If those Maximals were anything like 
 him,
 >  > they would try to parley first. He then thought of Depthcharge 
 and
 >  > Rattrap. What to expect? Well, the first thing was surely not to 
 scare
 >  > them... and seeing how people had fled when the alarm broke out, 
 that
 >  > was a bad start.
 >  >
 >  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 >  > >
 >  > > OOC: Sorry, I made that last post without reading the 
 following three
 >  > > responses.  I think it still fits.
 >  > >
 >  > > "Well, as I said, the citizens have been evacuated; however 
 other than
 >  > > locking down the base, the tower, and the airport, we really 
 don't
 >  > have any
 >  > > means to contain him.  Besides that, we have no place to put 
 the bot
 >  > if we
 >  > > do end up capturing it.  I think diplomacy or letting the Pred
 >  > escape would
 >  > > probably be our best options." he said.  "I would move that 
 minion
 >  > back to
 >  > > the CR or make a temporary holding facility, but I've learned 
 from
 >  > > experience that hastily built jails are nothing but trouble."
 >  > >
 >  > > He pushed a button on the holo table and brought up an 
 overhead map with
 >  > > lists of the teams floating above.
 >  > >
 >  > > Team One
 >  > > Lord Perseus
 >  > > Ravenchief
 >  > > 2 Troopers
 >  > >
 >  > > Team Two
 >  > > Rodimus
 >  > > Guardia
 >  > > Doc (independent)
 >  > >
 >  > > Team Three
 >  > > Salveo
 >  > > Kenzo
 >  > > Nightlight
 >  > > 4 Troopers
 >  > >
 >  > > "I can get you access to the tower if you want to locate 
 there.  You
 >  > should
 >  > > be able to see everything from there and I think your presence 
 may
 >  > give the
 >  > > scientists there a feeling of security.  I want all support to 
 be
 >  > directed
 >  > > by Rodimus, but avoid violence if at all possible."
 >  > >
 >  > > "The base team will be supported by our loyal troopers, 
 however you
 >  > may be
 >  > > called upon to assist if for some reason the base comes under 
 fire."
 >  > >
 >  > > "Teams 1 and 2 will leave via the tunnel down by the detention 
 facility,
 >  > > that way no one will see us leave the base and we can leave the
 >  > shields up.
 >  > > We need to make sure no one sees us leave.
 >  > >
 >  > > My team will proceed to the waterfront, and team 2 will 
 position
 >  > themselves
 >  > > so that they can cover us."
 >  > >
 >  > > "When everyone is in position, I will attempt to make contact 
 with
 >  > the bot.
 >  > > If he chooses violence, he will need to get through all of us 
 before
 >  > he gets
 >  > > up the ramp into the city."
 >  > >
 >  > > "And we all know the mission goals, we can change the strategy 
 as
 >  > conditions
 >  > > change.  Any questions?"
 >  > >
 >  > > On 3/8/07, Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
 >  > > >
 >  > > >   Doc sat, but something made him uncomfortable.
 >  > > >
 >  > > > Doc: Rodimus, shouldn't we lock down the city in case this 
 Predacon
 >  > > > decides to escape before we can deal with him?

 Guardia, in a

 to rest.
 >  > > > > It's just
 >  > > > > > been one crazy senario after another." replied Salveo.
 >  > > > > >
 >  > > > > > "Well, unfortunately I can't promise you that we'll have 
 time to
 >  > > > > rest. But
 >  > > > > > I'll try to the best of my ability to get us some time 
 to rest
 >  > > > up." said
 >  > > > > > Lord Perseus. "I will start the briefing when everyone 
 is here."

 >  > > > > > > realizing he probably shouldn't have put that idea in

 sure you do
